title: Flashlight Shadow Show
description: When a storm knocks out the electricity in the house, a clever mother turns the scary situation into a fun one by bringing out the flashlights. Flashlight Shadow Show celebrates creativity and will also teach emergent readers about classifying information, nouns, and plurals. The beautiful illustrations perfectly complement a very visual story.
